* description of  scripts

** extractFileNames.pl

Get filenames only

perl extractFileNames.pl < files.list  > files.txt

** filterClones.pl

perl filterClones.pl cloneset.1m  > candidates.txt

** processCandidates.pl

perl processCandidates.pl < candidates.txt > siblingsByToken.txt
